name: Curse of Fatma
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam February 2023

Move with W A S D you can cast a single curse by pressing 1, avoid the bats and curse them.

I learned a lot while developing this one even though it's unfinished and in a rough state with most of the features not finished. Still I had a lot of fun and I hope I will be able to do a more finished game in my next game jam.

Thank you for checking it out.
